unnormalised: EdTech Boost: Scholarship Portals Helping Students Find Funding!
normalised: EdTech Boost: Scholarship Portals Helping Students Find Funding!

unnormalised: Tired of endless application forms and missed deadlines for scholarships? Well, good news! EdTech is stepping up with scholarship portals making finding financial aid much easier. Think of it like Zomato, but for scholarships!
normalised: Tired of endless application forms and missed deadlines for scholarships? Well, good news! EdTech is stepping up with scholarship portals making finding financial aid much easier. Think of it like Zomato, but for scholarships!

unnormalised: These portals are gathering dust-free data from various sources, from central govt schemes like the "Pradhan Mantri Uchchatar Shiksha Protsahan Yojana" to smaller trusts awarding Rs. 5000 to deserving students.
normalised: These portals are gathering dust-free data from various sources, from central government schemes like the "Pradhan Mantri Uchchatar Shiksha Protsahan Yojana" to smaller trusts awarding rupees five thousand to deserving students.

unnormalised: Platforms are popping up faster than you can say "IIT-JEE," offering personalized recommendations based on your grades and background. Imagine, little Meena from Kanpur now has a fighting chance to secure a scholarship for her engineering dreams!
normalised: Platforms are popping up faster than you can say "I I T-J E E," offering personalized recommendations based on your grades and background. Imagine, little Meena from Kanpur now has a fighting chance to secure a scholarship for her engineering dreams!

unnormalised: Plus, many offer alerts for deadlines! No more missing out because you forgot to check on 26/01/2024. Some even offer essay writing tips & tricks.
normalised: Plus, many offer alerts for deadlines! No more missing out because you forgot to check on twenty six january two thousand and twenty four. Some even offer essay writing tips and tricks.

unnormalised: Experts predict a significant rise in applications via these portals by Diwali (around 14/11/2024), with some reporting traffic spikes around 17:00 hrs daily after college hours. So, if you’re looking for funding, get online now and explore your options. Don’t miss out; the early bird gets the scholarship...or something like that! This is especially useful for students aiming for universities far away - even 2000 km is manageable with the right funding!
normalised: Experts predict a significant rise in applications via these portals by Diwali (around fourteenth november two thousand and twenty four), with some reporting traffic spikes around five p m daily after college hours. So, if you’re looking for funding, get online now and explore your options. Don’t miss out; the early bird gets the scholarship...or something like that! This is especially useful for students aiming for universities far away - even two thousand kilometer is manageable with the right funding!
